writings.text: 剣を落として舟を刻む

readings.text: けんをおとしてふねをきざむ

furigana.writing: 剣を落として舟を刻む
furigana.reading: けんをおとしてふねをきざむ

meanings.info: from a story in Master Lü's Spring and Autumn Annals
glossary: to be unaware that things are changing
to drop one's sword (in the river) and carve (a mark) on the boat (to mark the spot where the sword was dropped)
to not be getting with the times
